title: Jesy Nelson remains inseparable with boyfriend Chris Hughes as they go on a bike ride
text:
She regularly posts loved-up updates with boyfriend Chris Hughes on Instagram.

And Jesy Nelson and her boyfriend shared insights into their romantic day together, as they went for a bike ride and enjoyed a cosy night in on Friday.

The Little Mix star, 28, wrapped up warm in a khaki padded jacket and a pair of black tracksuit bottoms and a hooded jacket with shades for their cycling jaunt.

I like to ride my bicycle: Jesy Nelson and her boyfriend shared insights into their romantic day together, as they went for a bike ride and enjoyed a cosy night in on Friday

Meanwhile, Chris, 26, donned a black North Face jack with slim-fitting grey sweatpants and trainers, while finishing his outfit with a baseball cap.

During their ride, the couple stopped for a hot drink and a piece of cake, as Chris shared a sweet clip of Jesy tucking into her whipped cream-covered hot chocolate.

They were later pictured cuddling up on a train as they headed from Chris' village back to Jesy's hometown for a games night back at her house.

Cute: They changed out of their daytime attire and into some comfortable pyjamas, which Chris shared on his social media as Jesy sat on the floor preparing to play the game

Pit stop: During their ride, the couple stopped for a hot drink and a piece of cake, as Chris shared a sweet clip of Jesy tucking into her whipped cream-covered hot chocolate

Cute! The Little Mix star, 28, wrapped up arm in a khaki padded jacket and a pair of black tracksuit bottoms and a hooded jacket with shades for their cycling jaunt

They changed out of their daytime attire and into some comfortable pyjamas, which Chris shared on his social media as Jesy sat on the floor preparing to play the game.

The singer appeared fresh-faced as she opted for no make-up and donned orange Reeces-themed pyjamas and fluffy pink heart covered slippers.

The couple gave a play-by-play commentary of their game, as they engaged in an intense game of Jenga while tucking into some chicken dippers.

Intense: The couple gave a play-by-play commentary of their game, as they engaged in an intense game of Jenga while tucking into some chicken dippers

Their day together comes shortly after Chris told MailOnline how protective he is over his girlfriend, as he revealed he struggled to bite his tongue when she's cruelly trolled on social media.

The loved-up Love Island hunk also spoke about his long-term plans with the star, revealing he plans to be with her 'forever'.

Jesy recently detailed the horrific trolling she suffered after shooting to fame on the X Factor in a BBC Three documentary called Odd One Out, in which she also revealed she attempted to take her own life.

And when it comes to his girlfriend still getting rude comments towards, Chris admitted he 'struggles' with it and finds it difficult to turn a blind eye.

Protective: Their day together comes shortly after Chris told MailOnline how protective he is over his girlfriend

He explained: 'I struggle with it. Even with myself, when I initially came out of Love Island, I was kind of unaware of the whole social media thing so I used to snap back a lot and I used to fight back to everything. But I learnt that it isn’t the way forward.

'When it’s her, I get really protective and I struggle to bite my tongue. I have bitten back at a few people, when people say negative comments on my own stuff, I’ll say something back and block them. I like to have my say because I’m one of them people who fight for stuff.'

He continued: 'But I am very protective, because It’s not nice. Other people judge people who they don’t know, but I know who she is. Honestly you couldn’t meet anyone nicer, you’d walk away thinking “she’s the nicest girl I’ve ever met!” She’s got a heart of gold and she wouldn’t say boo to a goose.

'She’s got time for everyone and that’s the most frustrating thing. Stereotypically people would think she’s a different kind of girl but she’s such a nice person. My family just love her to bits.'
description: Jesy Nelson and her boyfriend shared insights into their romantic day together, as they went for a bike ride and enjoyed a cosy night in on Friday.
